pkgmetadata.longdescription: Enhanced Assignment Operator to Overwrite or Grow Objects // Use '..' on the right hand side of the ':=' operator as a shorthand for the left hand side, so that 'var := f(..) + ..' is equivalent to 'var - f(var) + var'. This permits the user to be explicit about growing an object or overwriting it using its previous value, avoids repeating a variable name, and saves keystrokes, time, visual space and cognitive load.
